content: संधृ {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To hold, bear, carry. {@--2@} To hold up, support, prop, sustain; अरैः संधार्यते नाभिः <ls>Pt. 1. 81.</ls> {@--3@} To curb, restrain, check. {@--4@} To keep in mind, retain in memory; यः सततं परिपृच्छति शृणोति संधारयत्यनिशं <ls>Pt. 5. 92.</ls> {@--5@} To hold, have, possess; retain, keep; <ls>Pt. 1. 112.</ls> {@--6@} To observe, follow. {@--7@} To bear, suffer, endure. {@--8@} To survive, remain alive.
